Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelView

Class PlayerView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelView.PlayerView
public class PlayerView extends Object
PlayerView contains all information about a specific player that the client needs to know: school students, professors and towers, the type of tower and the type of wizard of the player, the last played assistant associated to the maximum movement that mother nature can be moved by him and (if the game is expert), the number of coins that the player have. Students are represented with the Integer[] representation.

      public void updateDiningRoom(RealmType[] students, boolean isInsertion)
      Updates the dining room of the player by inserting or removing the specified students.

      isInsertion - true if the students are inserted, otherwise false

    • updateStudents

      private static void updateStudents(Integer[] studentContainer, RealmType[] students, boolean isInsertion)
      Updates the specified studentContainer (represented as Integer[]) by inserting or removing the specified students.
      Parameters:
      studentContainer - the Integer[] representation of the student container (entrance or dining room)
      students - the students that have been inserted/removed
      isInsertion - true if the students are inserted, otherwise false

    • resetStudentsTo

      public void resetStudentsTo(RealmType[] entrance, RealmType[] diningRoom)
      Resets students of entrance and dining room to the specified students. All previous students' information are removed
      Parameters:
      entrance - the new students of the entrance
      diningRoom - the new students of the dining room

    • updateLastPlayedAssistant

      public void updateLastPlayedAssistant(int assistant, int motherNatureMovement)
      Updates the last assistant played by the player. The assistant have the specified id and the specified maximum mother nature movement
      Parameters:
      assistant - the id of the assistant
      motherNatureMovement - the maximum mother nature movement of the assistant
